import logo from './logo.svg'; import './App.css'; import React, { useState, useEffect, Component } from "react"; import axios from 'axios' const api = axios.create({ "baseURL":'' }); class App extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { table: [ { 'storyDescription': 'Create the spec sheet for the customer meeting', 'jobType': 'Requirements', 'developerRole': 'Business Analyst', 'storypoints': 8, 'Hours': 20, 'HourlyRate': 90, 'Cost': 1800, 'numberOfPeople': 1 }, { 'storyDescription': 'Push the code into the TFS pipe and run the ML code', 'jobType': 'Pipeline Push', 'developerRole': 'Machine learning Engineer', 'storypoints': 13, 'Hours': 25, 'HourlyRate': 210, 'Cost': 5250, 'numberOfPeople': 2 } ], row: { 'storyDescription': 'Create the spec sheet for the customer meeting', 'jobType': 'Requirements', 'developerRole': 'Business Analyst', 'storypoints': 8, 'Hours': 20, 'HourlyRate': 90, 'Cost': 1800, 'numberOfPeople': 1 } } this.getUserStory = this.getUserStory.bind(this); } getUserStory(e) { let user_story = e.currentTarget.value; let data = { 'storyDescription': user_story, 'jobType': '', 'developerRole': '', 'storypoints': 0, 'Hours': 0, 'HourlyRate': 0, 'Cost': 0, 'numberOfPeople': 0 } return data; } render() { let tableStyle = { width: "100%", borderRadius: 10, boxShadow: '0px px 10px 10px #00000010', border: "1px solid #cecece", backgroundColor: "#ece9e9" } return (
App is Built with React
API call is Azure Cloud function
App is hosted on Azure web app
AI is written in python using Tensorflow
L o o g l e
powered by Frank Frisby and data source: pretrained GPT 3. model (used API)
{this.state.row &&
User Story Job Type Role Story Points Hours Hourly Rate Cost # People

} {this.state.table.length > 1 &&

{row.storyDescription} {row.jobType} {row.developerRole} {row.storypoints} {row.Hours} ${row.HourlyRate} ${row.Cost} {row.numberOfPeople} ×
{this.state.table.reduce((a, b) => a.storypoints + b.storypoints)} {this.state.table.reduce((a, b) => a.Hours + b.Hours)} ${this.state.table.reduce((a, b) => a.HourlyRate + b.HourlyRate)} ${this.state.table.reduce((a, b) => a.Cost + b.Cost)} {this.state.table.reduce((a, b) => a.numberOfPeople + b.numberOfPeople)}
}
); } } export default App;
